EmailTemplate.name: Foreign Qualification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in Foreign Qualifying your business into another state. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the necessary documents with your respective Secretary of State.
For your reference, general information regarding Foreign Qualification has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
Foreign Qualification is the process in which the existing entity is registered to conduct business in a state outside of the state in which it was formed. This process allows the existing business to use all of its existing financial data and business history for conducting business in the state into which it qualifies. Foreign entities will be required to fulfill any state or local requirements or licenses in the new state, as well as file annual reports and pay any required state fees.
For your convenience, we have listed below all relevant pricing, as well as some additional services that may be beneficial to your business.
FOREIGN QUALIFICATION Rush - $339.00 + state fee - (10-15 business days)* Standard - $229.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-30 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "GET STARTED" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/foreign-qualifications-for-business.html
ADDITIONAL SERVICES Registered Agent - $159.00/year ($149.00 first year)
* Some states may have delays which affect the listed turnaround time. To determine if your state is affected, please contact a Specialist at the phone number listed below.
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
